metadata.title: CVE-2018-1002209 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: QuaZIP before 0.7.6 is vulnerable to directory traversal, allowing attackers to write to arbitrary files via a ../ (dot dot slash) in a Zip archive entry that is mishandled during extraction. This vulnerability is also known as 'Zip-Slip'.

criterions.comment: libquazip package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.7.6-1').
